title: Can anyone give me a review about how is BDes at Pes?
content:
I'm about to finish my board exams and my pessat interview is on 2nd April, i just wanted to know if is it worth doing BDes at pes and how hard is the interview round..
And if possible please suggest some good colleges in Bangalore that offer BDes.

comments.body:
No.
sucks , if you want to save your life, do NOT come to pes for BDes. But, if you want memes and stickers and want to watch your life burn, you're welcome to join us.
Oh, thanks for the review:'), could you tell me more about your experience in there please?
